TEXT.French: Salutations, [CT_NAME]. Je suis [OUR_NAME]. Je parle au nom de [OUR_EMPIRE].
TEXT.German: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. I speak on behalf of the [OUR_EMPIRE].
TEXT.Italian: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. I speak on behalf of the [OUR_EMPIRE].
TEXT.Spanish: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. I speak on behalf of the [OUR_EMPIRE].

TEXT.English: I have no time right now to interrogate 'powindah', [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: Je n'ai pas de temps perdre en bavardages inutiles, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: I will not soil myself by talking with 'powindah'.
TEXT.French: Je n'ai pas de temps perdre en bavardages inutiles, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Of course not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until I have made you feel exactly all the pain that I desire for 'powindah' such as yourself!
TEXT.French: Certainement pas, [CT_NAME]. La Guerre ne prendra fin que lorsque nous vous aurons fait disparatre de la surface d'Arrakis!
TEXT.German: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!
TEXT.Italian: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!
TEXT.Spanish: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!

TEXT.English: No, [CT_NAME]. Our purge of 'powindah' such as yourself shall continue!
TEXT.French: Certainement pas, [CT_NAME]. La Guerre ne prendra fin que lorsque nous vous aurons fait disparatre de la surface d'Arrakis!
TEXT.German: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!
TEXT.Italian: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!
TEXT.Spanish: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to question who may be interesting.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME]. J'ai toujours un moment pour converser et partager avec mes amis et allis.
TEXT.German: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to question those that may sense something of the 'Language of God'.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME]. J'ai toujours un moment pour converser et partager avec mes amis et allis.
TEXT.German: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.

TEXT.English: What could you, 'powindah', possibly reveal that would be of even the slightest benefit to me?
TEXT.French: Que pourriez-vous dire qui pourrait avoir le moindre intrt pour moi?
TEXT.German: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Italian: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Spanish: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?

TEXT.English: How could you, 'powindah', say anything that would not make my ears feel soiled?
TEXT.French: Que pourriez-vous dire qui pourrait avoir le moindre intrt pour moi?
TEXT.German: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Italian: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Spanish: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?

TEXT.English: Would you care to share some of your wealth and contribute to the 'Great Belief', [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: Seriez vous prts partager un peu de vos biens avec des bons amis, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.German: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: For the sake of continuing our mutual understanding, I request your assistance.
TEXT.French: Par respect de notre amiti durable, Je vous demande assistance.
TEXT.German: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.
TEXT.Italian: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.
TEXT.Spanish: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.

TEXT.English: You may pay us in tribute today or suffer my pain techniques tomorrow. The decision is yours.
TEXT.French: Vous allez nous payer, soit par un tribut aujourd'hui, soit de votre sang demain. Cette dcision vous appartient.
TEXT.German: You may pay us in tribute today or in blood tomorrow. The decision is yours.
TEXT.Italian: You may pay us in tribute today or in blood tomorrow. The decision is yours.
TEXT.Spanish: You may pay us in tribute today or in blood tomorrow. The decision is yours.

TEXT.English: (Multiple voices echoing...) - Receive our Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am 'The Speaker'. I represent the collective mind of the Executrix Council.
TEXT.French: Salutations, [CT_NAME]. Je suis [OUR_NAME]. Je parle au nom de [OUR_EMPIRE].
TEXT.German: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. I speak on behalf of [OUR_EMPIRE].
TEXT.Italian: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. I speak on behalf of [OUR_EMPIRE].
TEXT.Spanish: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. I speak on behalf of [OUR_EMPIRE].

TEXT.English: Idle time for worthless minds is not allowed in our cognitive process, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: Je n'ai pas de temps perdre en bavardages inutiles, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: I have no time for your worthless babble, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Negative, [CT_NAME]. Our mighty raid will persevere like a never-ending electric tempest until we have ravaged everything that still belongs to you!
TEXT.French: Certainement pas, [CT_NAME]. La Guerre ne prendra fin que lorsque nous vous aurons fait disparatre de la surface d'Arrakis!
TEXT.German: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!
TEXT.Italian: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!
TEXT.Spanish: Certainly not, [CT_NAME]. The war will continue until we have wiped you from the face of Arrakis!

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. We can always spare a few periods to compute with healthy minds.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME]. J'ai toujours un moment pour converser et partager avec mes amis et allis.
TEXT.German: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.

TEXT.English: What could you possibly express that would be of even the slightest benefit to our thinking processes?
TEXT.French: Que pourriez-vous dire qui pourrait avoir le moindre intrt pour moi?
TEXT.German: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Italian: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Spanish: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?

TEXT.English: Would you care to share some of your wealth and help our abstract plans give birth to action, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: Seriez vous prts partager un peu de vos biens avec des bons amis, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.German: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: For the sake of our continued mental association, I request something from your hands.
TEXT.French: Par respect de notre amiti durable, Je vous demande assistance.
TEXT.German: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.
TEXT.Italian: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.
TEXT.Spanish: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.

TEXT.English: You may pay us directly in tribute today or indirectly by means of crushing raids tomorrow. Your lowly mind can decide.
TEXT.French: Vous allez nous payer, soit par un tribut aujourd'hui, soit de votre sang demain. Cette dcision vous appartient.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to enjoy the company of loyal friends and allies.

TEXT.German: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.

TEXT.English: I suspect that you are a faithless person. Why should I listen?
TEXT.French: Que pourriez-vous dire qui pourrait avoir le moindre intrt pour moi?
TEXT.German: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Italian: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?

TEXT.English: Would you care to share some of your good fortune with your loyal friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.French: Par respect de notre amiti durable, Je vous demande assistance.
TEXT.German: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.
TEXT.Italian: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.
TEXT.Spanish: For the sake of our continued friendship, I request your assistance.

TEXT.English: You may grant what is due to this House today or face the consequences that honour and loyalty will demand tomorrow. The decision is yours.
